- Topic: Amendment to Comprehensive Zoning Ordinance for Louis Armstrong Park
- Summary: Requesting an Amendment to the text of the Comprehensive Zoning Ordinance to provide that within the boundaries of Louis Armstrong Park, any permitted conditional use otherwise allowed in the OS-R Regional Open Space District, as provided in Article 7, must be determined to be ancillary to the Park's past and present uses to be allowable. The City Planning Commission is authorized to consider text changes to Article 7, amending Article 18 to create a new overlay zoning district, and/or through a map amendment that would rezone all or a portion of Armstrong Park, namely the boundaries of Congo Square to an OS-N Neighborhood Open Space District. The recommendation of the City Planning Commission being "FOR MODIFIED APPROVAL".
